scripts.// Development: Start development servers for each app
scripts.dev: pnpm run --parallel --stream --filter './apps/*' dev 2>/dev/null || echo 'âš ï¸  No dev scripts found in apps'
scripts.dev:api: pnpm --filter @prototype/api --if-present dev || echo 'âš ï¸  API dev script not configured'
scripts.dev:admin: pnpm --filter @prototype/admin --if-present dev || echo 'âš ï¸  Admin dev script not configured'
scripts.dev:android: echo 'ğŸ“± Android: Use Android Studio or run ./gradlew from apps/android'
scripts.// Building: Build all apps and packages for production
scripts.build: pnpm run build:shared && pnpm run --parallel --stream --filter './apps/*' build 2>/dev/null || echo 'âš ï¸  No build scripts found'
scripts.build:api: pnpm --filter @prototype/api --if-present build || echo 'âš ï¸  API build script not configured'
scripts.build:admin: pnpm --filter @prototype/admin --if-present build || echo 'âš ï¸  Admin build script not configured'
scripts.build:android: echo 'ğŸ“± Android: Run ./gradlew build from apps/android'
scripts.build:shared: pnpm --filter @prototype/shared --if-present build || echo 'âš ï¸  Shared build script not configured'
scripts.build:all: pnpm run build:shared && pnpm run --filter './apps/*' --if-present build
scripts.lint: pnpm run --parallel --stream --filter '**' --if-present lint || echo 'âš ï¸  No lint scripts configured'
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm run --parallel --stream --filter '**' --if-present 'lint:fix' || echo 'âš ï¸  No lint:fix scripts configured'
scripts.typecheck: pnpm run --parallel --stream --filter '**' --if-present typecheck || echo 'âš ï¸  No typecheck scripts configured'
scripts.test: pnpm run --parallel --stream --filter '**' --if-present test || echo 'âš ï¸  No test scripts configured'
scripts.test:watch: pnpm run --parallel --stream --filter '**' --if-present 'test:watch' || echo 'âš ï¸  No test:watch scripts configured'
scripts.test:coverage: pnpm run --parallel --stream --filter '**' --if-present 'test:coverage' || echo 'âš ï¸  No coverage scripts configured'
scripts.clean: pnpm run clean:build && pnpm run clean:deps
scripts.clean:build: pnpm -r --parallel exec rm -rf dist build .next .turbo coverage .tsbuildinfo 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.clean:deps: pnpm -r --parallel exec rm -rf node_modules 2>/dev/null && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.check:repo: node -e "console.log('âœ“ Node ' + process.version)" && pnpm -v > /dev/null && echo "âœ“ pnpm $(pnpm -v)" && pnpm ls --depth 0 > /dev/null 2>&1 && echo 'âœ“ Workspaces OK' || echo 'âš ï¸  Workspaces need install'
scripts.check:all: pnpm run check:repo && pnpm run format:check && pnpm run typecheck && pnpm run lint
scripts.postinstall: echo 'âœ… Dependencies installed. Run `pnpm dev` to start development.'
